verses.verse: How hast thou helped <S%H5826><s%> him that is without power <S%H3581><s%>! How hast thou saved <S%H3467><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> that hath no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%>!
How hast thou counselled <S%H3289><s%> him that hath no <S%H3808><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, And plentifully <S%H7230><s%> declared <S%H3045><s%> sound knowledge <S%H8454><s%>!
To whom hast thou uttered <S%H5046><s%> words <S%H4405><s%>? And whose spirit <S%H5397><s%> came forth from thee <S%H3318><s%>?
They that are deceased <S%H7496><s%> tremble <S%H2342><s%> Beneath the waters <S%H4325><s%> and the inhabitants thereof <S%H7931><s%>.
Sheol <S%H7585><s%> is naked <S%H6174><s%> before God <S%H11><s%>, And Abaddon hath no covering <S%H3682><s%>.
He stretcheth out <S%H5186><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> over empty space <S%H8414><s%>, And hangeth <S%H8518><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> upon nothing <S%H1099><s%>.
He bindeth up <S%H6887><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in his thick clouds <S%H5645><s%>; And the cloud <S%H6051><s%> is not rent under them <S%H1234><s%>.
He incloseth <S%H270><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of his throne <S%H3678><s%>, And spreadeth <S%H6576><s%> his cloud upon it <S%H6051><s%>.
He hath described <S%H2328><s%> a boundary <S%H2706><s%> upon the face of the waters <S%H6440><s%>, Unto the confines <S%H8503><s%> of light <S%H216><s%> and darkness <S%H2822><s%>.
The pillars <S%H5982><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> tremble <S%H7322><s%> And are astonished <S%H8539><s%> at his rebuke <S%H1606><s%>.
He stirreth <S%H7280><s%> up the sea <S%H3220><s%> with his power <S%H3581><s%>, And by his understanding <S%H8394><s%> he smiteth <S%H4272><s%> through Rahab <S%H7293><s%>.
By his Spirit <S%H7307><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are garnished <S%H8235><s%>; His hand <S%H3027><s%> hath pierced <S%H2342><s%> the swift <S%H1281><s%> serpent <S%H5175><s%>.

Lo <S%H7098><s%>, these are but the outskirts of his ways <S%H1870><s%>: And how small <S%H8102><s%> a whisper <S%H1697><s%> do we hear <S%H8085><s%> of him <S%H7482><s%>! But the thunder of his power <S%H1369><s%> who can understand <S%H995><s%>?
